10  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.eclipse;
11  
12  import java.util.SortedSet;
13  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
14  
15  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
16  
17  import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
18  
19  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings;
20  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.AbstractFormatterStrategy;
21  
22  /**
23   *
24   * @author markiewb
25   * @author bahlef
26   */
27  public class EclipseFormatterStrategy extends AbstractFormatterStrategy {
28  	private final EclipseFormatterexternal/formatter/strategies/eclipse/EclipseFormatter.html#EclipseFormatter">EclipseFormatter formatter = new EclipseFormatter();
29  
30  	/**
31  	 * {@inheritDoc}
32  	 */
33  	@Override
34  	protected void format(StyledDocument document, int dot, int mark, SortedSet<Pair<Integer, Integer>> changedElements) {
35  		EclipseFormatterRunnable formatterRunnable = new EclipseFormatterRunnable(document, formatter, dot, mark, changedElements);
36  		formatterRunnable.run();
37  	}
38  
39  	/**
40  	 * {@inheritDoc}
41  	 */
42  	@Override
43  	protected boolean isActivated(StyledDocument document) {
44  		Preferences pref = Settings.getActivePreferences(document);
45  		return pref.getBoolean(Settings.ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_ENABLED, false);
46  	}
47  }
